name: Bulbasaur

attacks.name: Leech Seed
attacks.text: Unless all damage from this attack is prevented, you may remove 1 damage counter from Bulbasaur.

flavorText: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. Thus, a plant sprouted and now grows with this Pok√©mon. LV. 13 #1

strengths: Leech Seed provides self-healing, allowing Bulbasaur to recover from damage
Respectable 40 HP for a Basic Pokemon
Low retreat cost of 1 makes it mobile
Decent 20 damage output for a Basic Pokemon
weaknesses: Double weakness to Fire-type attacks makes it extremely vulnerable to Charizard and other Fire Pokemon
Requires 2 Grass energy to attack, which can be slow to set up
Healing effect requires damage to not be prevented, making it less effective against Resistance or Defender
synergies: Energy Trans from Venusaur allows flexible energy management
Pokemon Center can fully heal Bulbasaur while Leech Seed provides ongoing recovery
Defender can reduce incoming damage while Leech Seed heals
PlusPower increases Leech Seed's damage to 30
counters: Fire-type Pokemon like Charizard and Arcanine
One-hit knockout attacks that prevent healing
